channel.title: Need a ::report command
channel.description:
I want a command that is setup like this: [code] ::report [player]-[offense][/code] and it sends this message to all mods/admins on the server. Example:
player1: ::report player332-offensive language
sends this message to everyone with playerRights of 1 or higher on the server:
Player1: player332-offensive language
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 11:23:28 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Need a ::report command
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

I want a command that is setup like this:

 ::report [player]-[offense]

and it sends this message to all mods/admins on the server.

Example:

player1: ::report player332-offensive language

sends this message to everyone with playerRights of 1 or higher on the server:

Player1: player332-offensive language
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 11:23:28 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
